channel.title: Hwo do i make spec bars?

item.title: Hwo do i make spec bars?
item.dc:creator: @mrtube mrtube
item.description:
@mrtube wrote:

hey im currently adding specs to my server as all the tuts failed =[

ive added specs to items that already had special bars so i was wondering if any1 could pleaseee

tell me how i make a wep have a special bar as this didnt work

[code]public void spec() { // real working specs by Mod Adam
if(!inSafezone()) {
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (specBar >= 50) {
setAnimation(1658);
attackPlayersWithin(306, misc.random(playerMaxHit), 1);
hitDiff = 24;
inCombat();
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
specialRestoreTimer = 50;
specBar -= 50; // Specs - by Mod Adam
specglow = false;
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs
}
}
}
}

public void SpecProcess() { // real working specs by Mod Adam
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 /dds/ ) {
specbar(12323);
}

if (specBar >= 100)
{
frame230(0, 12325, 0, 0);//beginning
frame230(0, 12326, 0, 0);//2nd part
frame230(0, 12327, 0, 0);//3rd part
frame230(0, 12328, 0, 0);//4th part
frame230(0, 12329, 0, 0);//middle
frame230(0, 12330, 0, 0);//4 from end
frame230(0, 12331, 0, 0);//3 from end
frame230(0, 12332, 0, 0);//2 from end
frame230(0, 12333, 0, 0);//1 from end
frame230(0, 12334, 0, 0);//end
}
if (specBar == 50)
{
frame230(0, 12328, 0, 0);//4th part
frame230(0, 12329, 0, 0);//middle
frame230(0, 12330, 0, 0);//4 from end
}
if (specBar == 0)
{
specbar(12325);
}

}[/code]
